title: Bigger Than a Monster Truck
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 602 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 610L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and L
description: Monster trucks are big, but some vehicles are even larger. In Bigger Than a Monster Truck, students will discover some unusual and enormous vehicles used to move people, dirt, rocks, and other things. The amazing photos show just how huge these machines are, while the text explains the special jobs they do. Book and lesson are also available at levels I and L.
highFrequencyWords: cargo, enormous, mines, platform, propeller, remote, spacecraft, tunneling, vehicles
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ea and ee
awareness: Comparative and Superlative Adjectives                : Identify comparative and superlative adjectives
phonics: Synonyms                : Identify and understand the use of synonyms
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
